title: shree gaNanatha, lambOdhara (geetham)
sahitya:
lambOdara lakumikara



ambaasuta amaravinuta







caraNam 1







shree gaNanaatha sindoora varNa



karuNa saagara karivadana



(lambOdara)







caraNam 2







siddha caaraNa gaNa sEvita



siddhi vinaayaka tE namO namO



(lambOdara)







caraNam 3







sakala vidyaadi poojita



sarvOttama tE namO namO



(lambOdara)
